::DarkMouse::

She walks back to her console and looks at Twister. "Thanks for all 
your help earlier.  And for taking care of this one for me." holds up 
Akura.  She looked at the rat and thought about Scorponok.  He had 
been gone for a long time now.  She was missing him.  She hoped he 
would return soon.  She held the rat to her face and she nuzzled it. 
She felt lonely.

She looked back up at Twister." Well, nothing going on right now.How 
about we keep training Akura? Or would you rather do something else?"
